message: Hi Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that is truly valuable, and I believe it could be of significant benefit to you. While I can't disclose the specific details just yet, I assure you it's worth at least $10000 to me. I'm willing to offer it to you for $15000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you. Let me know your thoughts!
